isis.stitle: Procedural Guideline - VALVE COVER AND/OR GASKET, REPLACE (RIGHT SIDE)

wtsproc.wtsdescrip: VALVE COVER AND/OR GASKET, REPLACE (RIGHT SIDE)
wtsproc.config: Left to right side viewed as sitting in driver's seat looking forward.

step1.para: Chock wheels.
Disconnect battery.
Drain cooling system to include removal of access plate from belly pan.
Remove complete air filter assembly.
Disconnect serpentine belt.
Drain air tanks. Disconnect oil lines, coolant hoses, air lines and wire connection from air compressor. Remove air compressor with mount bracket attached.
Remove both charge air cooler pipes / hoses. Cap openings.
Remove air intake y-pipe. Cap openings.
Syphon oil from high pressure oil pump reservoir for power steering pump removal. Re-install high pressure oil pump reservoir plug.
Disconnect power steering hose support brackets. Remove power steering pump and secure pump out of way for access.

note.para: Do not open power steering system.

step1.para: Disconnect oil pressure line from high pressure oil pump reservoir. Disconnect fuel lines from fuel filter. Secure lines out of way for access.
Remove 31 pin connector and glow plug support bracket from valve cover. Secure out of way for access.
Remove crankcase vent tube / hose from valve cover.
Remove bolts retaining valve cover. Remove valve cover.
Disconnect wiring from valve cover gasket. Remove gasket.
Clean valve cover and mating surfaces.
Install valve cover gasket. Connect wiring to valve cover gasket.
Install valve cover. Torque bolts to spec.
Install crankcase breather tube to valve cover.
Install 31 pin connector and glow plug support bracket to valve cover.
Connect oil line to high pressure oil pump reservoir.
Connect fuel lines to fuel filter.
Install power steering pump with new O-ring. Torque nuts to spec. Connect line support bracket to valve cover.
Install intake y-pipe with new O-ring.
Install air compressor. Connect oil, air and coolant lines / hoses. Connect wire connection.
Install charge air cooler pipes / hoses.
Connect serpentine belt.
Install air filter assembly.
Close coolant drain valve. Install coolant drain access plate.
Fill engine with coolant.
Connect battery.
Add engine oil to proper level. Start engine and check for leaks.
Remove wheel chocks.
